# UIAlertControllerSeverity.default

**Case**

Indicates that the system should present the alert using the standard alert style.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Constants

- **UIAlertControllerSeverity.critical**: Indicates that the system should present the alert using the critical, or caution, style.

items.description: Indicates that the system should present the alert using the critical, or caution, style.
items.name: UIAlertControllerSeverity.critical
